metadata.source: Based on published tuition and fees from the Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System for 2014–15 and the percentage increase from 2014–15 to 2015–16 from Ma et al., Trends in College Pricing 2015, The College Board.
metadata.notes: Prices reflect average tuition and fees for full-time undergraduates over a full academic year., with i Institutions are weighted by full-time undergraduate fall enrollment.

title: Average Published Tuition and Fees by Sector and Degree Type, 2015–16
series: Additional tuition charged to out-of-state students

columns: Additional tuition charged to out-of-state students
groups: Additional tuition charged to out-of-state students
